message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $100! It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I've had great feedback from other customers who've purchased this item. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
Thank you for the offer and the confidence in your product. I'm willing to take the risk and purchase it at $100.

I'm thrilled to offer you this new product! As you know, I've had some great success with my previous offerings, and I'm confident this one will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, which is a steal considering its value. Plus, I've included a special bonus feature that I think you'll really appreciate. What do you think? Will you take a chance on this amazing product?
Thank you for the offer, but based on the outcome of the last product, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity to ensure I don't end up with another low-quality item.
